#summary Setup instructions
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Instructions =

1. Run [http://lastreadpost.googlecode.com/files/lastreadpost.sql lastreadpost.sql] in your target database

2. Put [http://lastreadpost.googlecode.com/files/lrp.php lrp.php] on your web server. Edit the server, database, username, and password variable as needed.

3. Install the [http://lastreadpost.googlecode.com/files/lastreadpostserver.user.js greasemonkey script], configure the area marked by "USER MODIFIABLE STUFF"
